message:
🕉️ Om Shri Satnam Sakshi 🕉️

At Shri Amrapur Asthan, Jaipur

**Cheti Chand Festival**
(Bhagwan Jhulelal Sai's Avataran Diwas)

**March 30, 2025 (Sunday)**

**Bhagwan Jhulelal Sai's Puja & Aarti**

Morning: 6:30 AM
Evening: 6 PM

**Bhajan-Satsang**

Morning: 7 AM to 9 AM
Evening: 4:30 PM to 6 PM

Heartiest congratulations and best wishes to everyone on Cheti Chand (New Year, Vikram Samvat 2082) !!

🕉️ Om Shri Satnam Sakshi 🕉️

📢 Organized by Amarapur Seva Samiti

📌 **Jan Aadhaar & Ayushman Card Camp**

🕘 **Every Sunday, Time: 9 AM to 11 AM**

📍 Location: Amarapur Asthan, Jaipur

📢 All devotees who wish to create or update their Jan Aadhaar or Ayushman Card are requested to attend the camp with the necessary documents!

📱 **Please bring the mobile phone linked to your Aadhaar card!!**

ℹ️ For more information, contact:
📞 Naveen Gurnani – 9509789843, Jaipur

🕉️ Om Satnam Sakhi 🕉️

With the blessings of Mangalmoorti Acharya Satguru Swami Teoonram Ji Maharaj
Organized by Amrapur Seva Samiti

**Free Physiotherapy Camp**

🕘 **Every Sunday, Time: 9 AM to 11 AM**

📍 Location: Amrapur Asthan, Jaipur

Conditions Treated: - Joint Pain - Back Pain - Knee Pain - Neck Pain - Elbow Pain - Paralysis - Sciatica Pain - Sports Injury - Frozen Shoulder - Ligament Injury - Children's Disability - Muscle Strain

📞 For more information, contact:
B.D. Tekwani (General Secretary) ☎ 9785362675
Dr. Shweta Belaramani (BPT. IAFT) ☎ 7597070427
